Hanzi: 䴔
鵁，jiāo，ㄐㄧㄠ ˉ。形声字。䴔是其简化字。字从交从鸟，交亦声。“交”本义指“（位置）相交、相错”，引申指“较量”、“比武”。“交”与“鸟”联合起来表示“鸟类比武中的优胜者”。本义：鸟类比武中的优胜者。
鵁, jiāo, ㄐㄧㄠˉ. Pictophonetic characters.䴔is its simplified character. The word is from the hand to the bird, and the word is to be heard. The original meaning of "Jiao" refers to "(location) intersect, mutually wrong", and by extension it refers to "competition" and "competition". The combination of "Jiao" and "Bird" means "the winner of the bird contest." Original meaning: the winner of the bird contest.

鵁字的基本解释

鵁
jiāo
〔鵁鶄（
j塶g ）〕一种水鸟，即“赤头鹭”。嘴长，脚高，体长约五十厘米。入夏，雄的头、颈及羽冠呈栗红色。分布于中国南方及印度等地。

鵁字的汉语字典释义
暂无汉字(鵁)的汉语大字典的解释
鵁字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵁； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1489第06
【唐韻】古肴切【集韻】【正韻】居肴切，?音交。【說文】鵁鶄也。【爾雅·釋鳥】鳽，鵁靑。【郭註】似鳧。脚高，毛冠。【郉疏】鵁鶄一名鳽。【博物志】鵁鶄，巢於高樹，生子穴中，銜其母翼，飛下飮食。【師曠·禽經】鵁鶄，睛交而孕。又曰旋目其名鷃，方目其名鴋。【司馬相如·上林賦】鵁鶄䴋目。【正字通】鵁鶄，似鳧。脚高，觜丹，頂有紅毛如冠。又鵁鸕。【爾雅·釋鳥】鴢頭鵁。【郭註】似鳧。江東謂之魚鵁。【釋文】許交切，音骹。【郉疏】一名頭鵁。【司馬相如·上林賦】?鴜鵁鸕。【註】魚鵁也。又【山海經】蔓聯山有鳥，羣居而朋飛，其毛如雌雉，名曰鵁。又【集韻】虛交切，音虓。義同。

鵁
Basic explanation of words
鵁
jiāo
〔鵁鶄(
j塶g)] a kind of water bird, namely "red-headed heron". The mouth is long, the feet are high, and the body length is about fifty centimeters. In summer, the male's head, neck and crest are chestnut red. Distributed in southern China and India.

[Tang Yun] Ancient delicacy cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ju delicacy cut, sound exchange. [Said the text] 鵁鶄也. 【Erya·Shiniao】鵁靑, 鵁靑. [Guo's Note] Like a mallard. The feet are high and the hair is crowned. 【郉shu】鵁鶄 a bitter. [Natural History] The 鵁鶄, nests in a high tree, gives birth to a child hole, holds its mother's wings, and flies down for food. 【Shi Kuang·Qian Jing】Kai, the eyes are conceived. It is said that Xuanmu has its name 鷃, and Fangmu has its name 鴋. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Kaiqiangmu. [Zhengzitong] 鵁鶄, like a mallard. The feet are high, Dan Dan, with red hair like a crown on the top. And 鵁鸬. 【Erya·Shiniao】鴢头鵁. [Guo's Note] Like a mallard. Jiangdong said that the fish 鵁. [Explanation] Xu Jiaoqie, sound pastel. [Xing Shu] A head monk. [Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu]? Kuai. [Note] Yu 鵁 also. Also [Shan Hai Jing] There are birds in Manlian Mountain, who live in groups and fly with friends, and their hair is like a female pheasant, and the name is 鵁. Also 【Jiyun】virtual intersection and sound. The same meaning.
